reporter_caption.center: IN MATTER OF ESTATE OF WALKER, 43 Haw. 320 (1959)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF THE ESTATE OF FREDERICK GEORGE EYTON WALKER, DECEASED.

opinion.panel: RICE, C.J., STAINBACK AND MARUMOTO, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: The petition for rehearing in the above entitled cause is denied without argument. The petition repeats matters fully briefed and argued by counsel on the hearing on appeal and fully considered by the court.
opinion.attorneys: W.Y. Char and Clifton H. Tracy for appellant Charles Dunbar Walker, for the petition.Page 321
